Description.Text: Located in the city*s newest neighbourhood - Harbor East, a vibrant, walkable district hugging the waterfront home to upscale condos, shops, restaurants, cinemas and Maryland*s finest health club. Overlooking the harbour from the finest waterfront site is the Four Seasons Hotel Baltimore. With historic fell*s point to the east, little Italy to the north and the inner harbour to the west - all easily reached on foot or by water taxi.

Deluxe - Partial Water View Room with a king bed or 2 double beds, 530 sqft/49 sqm. Max occ 3/0 or 2/2.
Physically Challenged - Water View Accessible Room with 2 double beds, 530 sqft/49 sqm. Offers wide doors, lowered light switches, peepholes and flashing alarm. Bathrooms feature roll-in shower and grab bars.
Physically Challenged - Partial Water View Accessible Room with a king bed, 530 sqft/49 sqm. Offers wide doors, lowered light switches, peepholes and flashing alarm. Bathrooms feature grab bars.
Premier - Partial Water View Room with balcony, king bed, 530 sqft/49 sqm. Max occ 2/0 or 2/1 *infant*.
Premier - Water View Room with balcony, with a king bed, 530 sqft/49 sqm. Max occ 2/0 or 2/1 *infant*.
Premier - Premier Water View Room with a king bed, 583 sqft/54 sqm. Max occ 2/0 or 2/1 *infant*.
Premier - Four Seasons Executive Suite City View with a king bed, 953 sqft/88 sqm. Max occ 3/0 or 2/2.
Suite - Light House Suite with a king bed, offers harbor view/lighthouse view, 1241 sq.ft/115 sqm. Located on floors 6 to 15. Max occ 3/0 or 2/2.
Suite - Harbor Suite with Harbor View, with a king bed, 1241 sqft/115 sqm. Max occ 3/0 or 2/2.
Suite - Four Seasons Executive Suite Water View with a king bed, 953 sqft/88 sqm. Max occ 3/0 or 2/2.
Deluxe - Terrace View room with a king bed or 2 double beds, 530 sqft/49 sqm. Max occ 3/0 or 2/2.
Deluxe - Water View Room with a king bed or 2 double beds, 530 sqft/49 sqm. Max occ 3/0 or 2/2.
Deluxe - Premier Partial Water View Room with a king bed, 583 sqft/54 sqm with partial inner harbor view. Max occ 2/0 or 2/1 *infant*.
Deluxe - City View Room with a king bed, 530 sqft/49 sqm with views overlooking city skyline. Max occ 3/0 or 2/2.
Physically Challenged - Partial Water View Accessible Room with 2 double beds, 530 sqft/49 sqm. Offers wide doors, lowered light switches, peepholes and flashing alarm. Bathrooms feature grab bars.
Physically Challenged - City View Accessible Room with a king bed, 530 sqft/49 sqm. Offers wide doors, lowered light switches, peepholes and flashing alarm. Bathrooms feature roll-in shower and grab bars.
Physically Challenged - City View Accessible Room with 2 double beds, 530 sqft/49 sqm. Offers wide doors, lowered light switches, peepholes and flashing alarm. Bathrooms feature roll-in shower and grab bars.
Physically Challenged - Water View Accessible Room with a king bed, 530 sqft/49 sqm. Offers wide doors, lowered light switches, peepholes and flashing alarm. Bathrooms feature roll-in shower and grab bars.
